name: B. DIV + MOD
statement:
Not so long ago, Vlad came up with an interesting function: f_a(x)=
left
lfloor
frac{x}{a}
right
rfloor + x
bmod a, where
left
lfloor
frac{x}{a}
right
rfloor is
frac{x}{a}, rounded , x
bmod a the remainder of the integer division of x by a.For example, with
a=3 and x=11, the value f_3(11) =
left
lfloor
frac{11}{3}
right
rfloor + 11
bmod 3 = 3 + 2 = 5.The number a is fixed and known to Vlad. Help Vlad
find the maximum value of f_a(x) if x can take any integer value from l
to r inclusive (l
le x
le r).
